content.body: Aren't the snapshot requirements on `HostMakeJobCallback` and `HostCallJobCallback` a bit too loose?
content.formatted_body: Aren't the snapshot requirements on HostMakeJobCallback and HostCallJobCallback a bit too loose?

content.body: we don't want hosts to populate `[[AsyncContextSnapshot]]` with any snapshot whatsoever
